# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/DC_comma.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/DC_comma.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/DC_defaults.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/DC_defaults.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/DC_delimiter_invalid.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/DC_delimiter_invalid.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/DC_tab.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/DC_tab.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/README ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/README ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_302.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_302.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/bug_302.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_302.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bug_302.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/exclude ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/exclude ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/transient_comma.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/transient_comma.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/transient_defaults.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/transient_defaults.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/transient_delimiter_invalid.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/transient_delimiter_invalid.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/transient_tab.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/transient_tab.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_302/bug_302.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_302.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_302.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_302/bug_302.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_302/bug_302.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;bug302son;output;delimiter")
